What is this page?

This is a branding page if you are making a devices with CLUB pre-installed or forking your own version of CLUB.

What is CLUB.com?

CLUB.com is the entity for building, testing and releasing the offical CLUB for different platforms and devices. If your lab is interested to release a customized version of CLUB, please modify this page to fill your Lab's information.
You can find the source of this page under web/SystemAO/vendor/index.html

System released by http://CLUB.com
